episode32.name: 32   Missouri, Miss State, and the Kentucky Preview
episode32.description: We talk about the sweep of the week for the hog hoops as well as preview the huge week against two tourney teams in Texas A&M and Kentucky.
episode32.keywords: Arkansas, Razorbacks, Basketball, SEC, Kentucky, Missouri, Mississippi State, Bulldogs, Methzou, Wildcats, football, beanum
